product_name: Klean Kanteen Polished Stainless-Steel Reflect Water Bottle with Bamboo Cap - 27 fl. oz.
long_description: The Klean Kanteen Polished Stainless-Steel Reflect water bottle with Bamboo cap has a beautiful mirror finish that is sure to catch the eye of all your friends. Bottle and cap are made with only 3 materials: tough 18/8 food-grade stainless steel, bamboo and food-grade silicone; materials are 100% BPA free. Cap is made from a single piece of stainless steel and finished with attractive bamboo wood and a small silicone gasket; handwash the wood cap and dry immediately. Bottle is dishwasher safe. Clip the Klean Kanteen Polished Stainless-Steel Reflect water bottle to a backpack with the stainless-steel bail and a small carabiner (sold separately). Slim design of the bottle fits neatly in standard sport bottle carriers and most bicycle bottle cages. Laser-etched Klean Kanteen logo won't wear off. Please note: Klean Kanteen water bottles are single walled and are not intended for use with hot liquids.
short_description: The Klean Kanteen Polished Stainless-Steel Reflect water bottle with Bamboo cap has a beautiful mirror finish that is sure to catch the eye of all your friends.
